name: WOLF – WordPress Posts Bulk Editor and Manager Professional
author: realmag777

sections.description:
WOLF – WordPress Posts Bulk Editor and Manager Professional (former name is WPBE) is WordPress plugin for managing, bulk edit and bulk delete WordPress posts, pages and custom post types data edit/delete in robust and flexible way. This plugin helps with managing real estate catalogs, cars and all another WordPress custom post types. Be professionals with managing data of your site!

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Latest PHP 8.x – FULL COMPATIBILITY!

âš ï¸ ATTENTION: THIS PLUGIN DOESN WORK CORRECTLY WITH WOOCOMMERCE PRODUCTS! FOR WOOCOMMERCE BULK EDIT USE BEAR

WOLF Features:

ğŸšš Bulk Editing of WordPress fields, taxonomies, meta fields

ğŸ—‚ï¸ Supports all custom post types

ğŸ—‘ï¸ [Bulk Deleting] – delete posts and custom post types in bulk using any filter combinations

ğŸ” Filtering fields for further bulk editing or export

ğŸ“¤ Export share selected data with your partners

ğŸ”„ History of Bulk and Solo operations with roll-back possibility

ğŸ”§ Add necessary Meta Fields to the system and manage by them. JSONed (serialized) metadata bulk editing is possible with nice popup where data constructor is in-built!

ğŸ§® Calculator for decimal meta fields

ğŸ”— Binded editing – edit several posts with two clicks!

âœï¸ Nice and convenient WordPress Posts Editor with rich HTML elements

ğŸ’¾ Instant saving of entered data by AJAX

ğŸ“‚ Automatic attach of any taxonomies related to the posts for further editing

ğŸ”§ POSSIBILITY of joint editing of the posts without interference to each other.

ğŸ’¼ Profiles for any set of columns for quick loading

ğŸ“ Profiles for any filters combination for quick loading

ğŸ”  Filter by empty TEXT meta fields for bulk operations

ğŸ£ Hook wpbe_wrap_field_val, allows to customize column cell content

ğŸ² Randomizer for numeric meta fields

ğŸŒ WPML Compatible

  • ğŸ’¬ Support

Fields possible to edit (in bulk) in FREE version of the plugin:

  • ğŸ–¼ï¸ Thumbnail
  • ğŸ·ï¸ Title
  • ğŸ“ Content
  • ğŸ”’ Password
  • ğŸ“œ Post Status
  • ğŸ“Œ Sticky
  • ğŸ“… Thumbnail
  • â²ï¸ Date Published
  • â²ï¸ Date Modified GMT
  • ğŸ“‹ Menu order
  • ğŸ“‚ 1 taxonomy (maybe Category)
  • âš™ï¸ Meta
  • ğŸ§© 2 product meta fields
  • ğŸ“š 2 history records

ğŸŒŸ In the premium version of the plugin it is possible to manipulate with all fields of the posts + Bulk Delete

ğŸŒŸ You can get premium version of the plugin on CodeCanyon

Make your site more profitable with next powerful scripts:

✅ BEAR – WooCommerce Bulk Editor and Products Manager Professional: WordPress plugin for managing and bulk edit WooCommerce Products data in robust and flexible way! Be professionals with managing data of your woocommerce e-shop!

✅ MDTF – WordPress Meta Data Filter and Taxonomies Filter: the plugin for filtering and searching WordPress content in posts and their custom types by taxonomies and meta data fields. The plugin has very high flexibility thanks to its rich filter elements and in-built meta fields constructor!

✅ WOOF – Products Filter for WooCommerce: products filter plugin for WooCommerce that allows your customers filter products by categories, attributes, products tags, products custom taxonomies and price â€“ a must have plugin for your WooCommerce online store!

✅ WOOCS – Currency Switcher for WooCommerce: is WooCommerce multi currency plugin, that allows your site visitors switch products prices currencies according to set currencies rates in the real time and pay in the selected currency (optionally). Allows to add any currency for WooCommerce store!

✅ TABLEON – WordPress Post Tables Filterable: WordPress plugin for displaying site posts and their custom post types in table format. Tables makes focus for your customers on the things they want to get, nothing superfluous, just what the client wants, and full attention to what is offered!

✅ WPCS – WordPress Currency Switcher: is a WordPress plugin that allows to switch currencies and get their rates converted in the real time on your site!

✅ MDTF – WordPress Meta Data Filter and Taxonomies Filter: the plugin for filtering and searching WordPress content in posts and their custom types by taxonomies and meta data fields. The plugin has very high flexibility thanks to its rich filter elements and in-built meta fields constructor!

sections.installation:
1. In your WordPress Dashboard go to “Plugins” -> “Add Plugin”.
  2. Search for “WOLF”.
  3. Install the plugin by pressing the “Install” button.
  4. Activate the plugin by pressing the “Activate” button.
  5. Go to wp-admin/admin.php?page=wpbe
  6. Manage your posts and their custom post types as you needed.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress version 4.9 or greater.
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater.
  • MySQL version 5.7 or greater.

Recommended Requirements

  • Latest WordPress version.
  • PHP version 8.0 or greater.
  • MySQL version 8.0 or greater, or MariaDB 10.5 or greater.
sections.faq:
Why would I need this?

You need if you want to change a posts data in bulk: title, content, meta fields, post type, taxonomies and etc.
See full list of fields and features on the plugin site

Where can I get the Premium version of WOLF

Get it on CodeCanyon

Documentation?

https://bulk-editor.pro/documentation/

I have an idea about the plugin, can I discuss it with you?

https://pluginus.net/support/forum/wpbe-wordpress-posts-bulk-editor-professional/

How to create a custom taxomomy?

Use this plugin https://wordpress.org/plugins/custom-post-type-ui/

More answers?

https://bulk-editor.pro/how-to-list/
sections.changelog:
1.0.8.3

  • security fix – thanks to Elmini from patchstack.com

1.0.8.2

  • security fixes – thanks to Dhabaleshwar Das from patchstack.com and also thanks to Wordfence WordPress security provider

1.0.8.1

  • security fix, thanks to thiennv from patchstack.com
  • minor fixes
  • Bulk Delete Operations feature is free for now!!

1.0.8

  • list of new features

1.0.7.2

  • 3 security fixes, thanks to Darius Sveikauskas from patchstack.com
  • PHP 8.2 notices are fixed
  • New option “Use gutenberg” – allows to edit content with the gutenberg editor if its enabled for the selected post type

1.0.7.1

  • security fix, thanks to thiennv from patchstack.com

1.0.7

  • security fix, thanks for Darius Sveikauskas from patchstack.com

1.0.6

  • added meta field of type “Gallery”

1.0.5

  • rebranding – new name is “WOLF – WordPress Posts Bulk Editor and Manager Professional”
  • small fixes
  • new design
  • added option for cells fonts size in tab settings

1.0.4

  • new features

1.0.3.2

  • small fixes

1.0.3

  • 1 jQuery fix for WordPress 5.6 compatibility

1.0.2

  • https://bulk-editor.pro/update-2-0-2-1-0-2/

1.0.1.3

  • 1 little fix in options

1.0.1.2

  • 1 little fix

1.0.1.1

  • Hot fix for WordPress 5.3 update

1.0.1

  • Small fixes
  • Added quick search block on the tools panel https://bulk-editor.pro/update-2-0-1/

1.0.0

  • Release
